# Review Guidelines

<!--NOTE: This section is for reference and is not designed to be edited in raw markdown-->

## ğŸ–‹ Author Guidelines

- [ ] This PR has been pre-reviewed by the Author before requesting review
- [ ] I have left helpful comments (with ğŸ”) to assist the reviewer if possible, indicating entry points, why certain approaches have been taken and any similar points.
- [ ] The description is complete and clear

## ğŸ™ˆ Reviewer Guidelines

### Checklist

- [ ] ğŸ“‚ File Names & Directory Structure
- [ ] ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» Code & Tests
- [ ] ğŸ§ª Test Coverage

### Review Comments

<details>
    <summary><strong>Comments</strong></summary>

    - ğŸ‘ (`:thumbs_up:`) -> **Nice!**: _The code is well written and well considered_
    - ğŸ” (`:mag:`) -> **Deep-Dive**: _Deep-dive on this code_
    - ğŸ’¬ (`:speech_balloon:`) -> **Comment**: _Free comment on this code_
    - â“ (`:question:`) -> **Question**: _Free comment_

</details>

<details>
    <summary><strong>Non-Blocking Suggestions</strong> (Suggestions that should may not block an approval)</summary>

    - â˜ï¸ (`:cloud:`) -> **Unclear**: _The code is unclear to read due to naming, layout or style_
    - ğŸ’„ (`:lipstick`) -> **Formatting/Convention**: _The code is formatted or written in a way that could be neater or meeting convention_
    - ğŸ¤” (`:thinking_face:`) -> **Potential Issue/Improvement**: _The code can be improved or has something that could potentially go wrong_
    - ğŸ¤ (`:pinching_hand:`) -> **Nitpick**: _The code has a small issue which is on the subjective end_

    > If one of these issues is severe enough to be a potential blocker, then include the âš ï¸ sign alongside to signal that this may be a blocker.

</details>

<details>
    <summary><strong>Blockers</strong> (Issues that would block an approval until resolved)</summary>

    - â‰ï¸ (`:interrobang:`) -> **Important Question**: _An important question that needs addressing._
    - âš ï¸ (`:warning:`) -> **Potential Serious Issue**: _A potential issue that needs fixing/addressings._
    - â›”ï¸ (`:no_entry:`) -> **Known Serious Issue**: _A known or identified issue that needs fixing._

</details>
